languages.text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.
languages.original_text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает количество уровней эффекта Жажда битвы, равное количеству врагов на соседних клетках.{br} Жажда битвы: +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}

traits.locale_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains battle tendency stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.{br} Battle Tendency: +5% critical hit chance +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この生物は隣接している敵の数に等しい戦闘傾向スタックを得る。{br} 戦闘の傾向: クリティカルヒット率が5％増加 {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が5％増加

languages.text: 下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物获得{g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}“战斗趋势”{/g}层数，等同于邻近敌人数量。
languages.original_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.

traits.locale_text: 下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物获得“战斗趋势”层数，等同于邻近敌人数量。{br} 每层“战斗趋势”会带来以下效果： +5%暴击率 +5%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}

languages.text: Al principio de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana tantas acumulaciones de {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}tendencia de batalla{/g} como enemigos adyacentes tiene.
languages.original_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana tantas acumulaciones de tendencia de batalla como enemigos adyacentes tiene.{br} Tendencia de batalla: +5 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}

languages.text: Zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält diese Kreatur {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}Kampfesneigung{/g}-Stapel in Höhe der Anzahl angrenzender Feinde.
languages.original_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält diese Kreatur Stapel von Kampfesneigung entsprechend der Anzahl an sie angrenzender Feinde{br} Kampfesneigung: +5 % kritische Trefferchance +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, cette créature acquiert un nombre de cumuls de {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}Tendance belliqueuse{/g} égal au nombre d'ennemis adjacents à sa position.
languages.original_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, cette créature acquiert un nombre de cumuls de Tendance au Combat égal au nombre d'ennemis adjacents à sa position.{br} Tendance au Combat : +5 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}

languages.text: Bu yaratık, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başlangıcında bitişiğindeki düşman sayısı kadar {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}harp eğilimi{/g} birikimi kazanır.
languages.original_text: At the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains {g|f:7536b6194de348379cc6d62116c26c81}battle tendency{/g} stacks equal to the number of enemies adjacent to them.
